channel.title: Disable automatic torrent downloading in Opera
channel.description:
Opera has the ability to manage your BitTorrent downloads, but I use µTorrent because it lets me download and has other features like only partial downloading torrents.
To disable this feature:
1. Type opera:config in the address bar 2. Click BitTorrent 3. Uncheck the "Enable" check box 4. Click "Save"
Now Opera will let you save the torrent files somewhere or open them so you can use your own BitTorrent client.
